0.Subtitle: In only 15 years the Global temperature is anticipated to exceed the 1.5°C milestone and is expected to surpass the 2°C benchmark after 2050

10.Subtitle: This benchmark is a tipping point for the future of the oceans

14.Subtitle: with increasingly warmer temperatures around the world, we are depleting the oceans of oxygen and suffocating all lifeforms

21.Subtitle: Do we want oceans that are empty of life and only filled with our garbage?

26.Subtitle: These animals don’t only sustain the marine ecosystem. They ultimately sustain us.

31.Subtitle: Human beings, and our economies, cultures, and communities depend on them.
